name: KARUNA SOCIETY FOR ANIMALS AND NATURE
briefDescription: 1.IN AND OUT PATIENT FOR SMALL ANIMALS - DAILY WE TREAT AT LEAST 10 ANIMALS2.ANIMAL BIRTH CONTROL OPERATION THEATER FOR SMALL ANIMALS - WE PERFORMED MORE THAN 11,000 OPERATIONS FOR DOGS AND CATS3. SHELTER FOR OLD, DISABLED AND SICK ANIMALS4.RESCUED MORE THAN 600 CATTLE FROM ILLEGAL TRANSPORTATION TO THE SLAUGHTER HOUSES. 5.CATTLE HOSPITAL - WE CONDUCTED MORE THAN 60 PLASTIC COW OPERATIONS, MORE THAN 50 ANIMAL BIRTH CONTROL OPERATION FOR COWS, BULLS AND BUFFALOES. 6. SHELTER FOR RESCUED CATTLE7. RESCUE CENTER FOR WILDLIFE
